data.body: KnotsBackend declares maxConcurrency: 1 but doesn't enforce it. Concurrent kno CLI calls from poll loops, list refetches, and rehydration race on the SQLite WAL writer lock, producing: Persisting failed: Another write batch or compaction is already active. Add a per-repo async queue to serialize write operations through the kno CLI.
data.title: Serialize KnotsBackend writes to prevent SQLite lock contention
